message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get $60, you get $40. It's better to settle now before inflation eats away at our potential gains!
Your offer was a bit one-sided, Alice. Let's be more realistic. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor. It's a decent deal considering your share decreases in value each round.
Bob, time is money, literally! My offer is now $55 for me and $45 for you.  Let's settle this before inflation shrinks the pot even further.
